subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Bethanie Mattek-Sands, who has toned down her outfits on the court, used a new plan to beat the former champion Li Na at the French Open on Thursday.
snippet: Bethanie Mattek-Sands, who has toned down her outfits on the court, used a new plan to beat the former champion Li Na at the French Open on Thursday.
